definitions.body: lit., of water Ex 15:23 (J); food Pr 27:7 (opp. [[מָתוֹק]]); wormwood ([[לַעֲנׇה]] Pr 5:4 (in sim. of end of harlot, cf. Ec 7:26 infr.); as subst. pl., of physical pain, result of curse [[לְמָרִים]] Nu 5:24, Nu 5:27, whence [[מֵי הַמָּרִים]] v:Nu 5:18 (cf. Di) v:Nu 5:19, v:Nu 5:23, v:Nu 5:24; of harmful result of ruthless fighting 2Sa 2:26; of wickedness Je 2:19, Je 4:18; = injurious, hurtful Is 5:20, Is 5:20 (opp. [[מָתוֹק]]).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of cry ([[חְעָקָה]], [[זְעָקָה]]) Ge 27:34 (J), Es 4:1; [[מִסְפֵּד מָָר]] Ez Eze 27:31 (del. Co); [[דָּבָר מָָר]] Ps 64:4; as adv. (cry, weep) bitterly Ez Eze 27:30 ([[מָרָה]]), Zep 1:14, Is 33:7 (both [[מַר]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of feeling, temper, esp. c. [[נֶפֶשׁ]]: [[אֲנׇשִׁים]] [[מָרֵי נֶפֶשׁ]] Ju Jdg 18:25 men fierce (GFM acrid) of temper, so 2Sa 17:8 (like a bear robbed of whelps); [[הַגּוֹי הַמַּר]] Hb Hab 1:6 the fierce nation; [[מַר־נֶפֶשׁ]] = discontented 1Sa 22:2; [[מַרֵי נֶפֶשׁ]] = the bitterly wretched Job 3:20, Pr 31:6, so ´[[מָרַת נ]] 1Sa 1:10; cf. [[יוֹם מָָר]] Am 8:10; as subst. abstr. [[מַר־נֶפֶשׁ]] bitterness of soul Is 38:15, Ez Eze 27:31 (del. Co), Job 7:11, Job 10:1 = [[נפשׁ מָרָה]] Job 21:25; cf. [[מָרָא]] Ru 1:20 (name given to Naomi by herself); [[מַר־הַמָּוֶת]] 1Sa 15:32 the bitterness of death ; [[מַר־מִמָּוֶת]] Ec 7:26 (metaph. of harlot); in Ez Eze 3:14 I went bitterly, del. [[מַר]] Co.—Is 38:17 v. [[מרר]].
